#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int T,i;
	int n,k,currn,maxn,count;
	char color,currc;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--){
		scanf("%d%d\n%c",&n,&k,&color);
		currn=1;
		maxn=-1;
		count=0;
		for(i=0;i<n-1;i++){
			scanf("%c",&currc);
			if(currc==color) currn++;
			else{
				maxn=max(currn,maxn);
				if(!(currn%k)) count+=(currn)/k;
				else count+=(currn/k)+1;
				//printf("%c %d\n",color,count); 
				color=currc;
				currn=1;
			}
		}
		maxn=max(maxn,currn);
		if(!(currn%k)) count+=(currn)/k;
		else count+=(currn/k)+1;
		if(maxn>=k) printf("%d\n",count );
		else printf("-1\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
